body_html: We can definitely do that, but would be nice to share the implementation. Would it be acceptable to make this optimization optional and turn it off outside of our integration? Any other ways which avoid the code duplication would be great too.

body: We can definitely do that, but would be nice to share the implementation. Would it be acceptable to make this optimization optional and turn it off outside of our integration? Any other ways which avoid the code duplication would be great too.
